title: Instructional Design Improvements for Working Memory Enhancement in Culinary Arts Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Students engage in concurrent theoretical learning and practical training, interacting with digital resources via personal devices. Assessment primarily focuses on summative evaluation

learning_goals: Understand the functions of working memory and explain its application in culinary education.
Propose instructional designs that minimize working memory load based on literature-driven research findings.
Apply working memory-friendly learning strategies (e.g., chunking, visual aids) in blended environments during practical sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
